name: ROOTS (menes_yulia)
description:
This game is about finding the fox family by choosing different options on the cards. Some choices lead to finding a family member, some just tell the story, while several of them can cause game over. In such cases player starts again from the start.

Controls:

Esc - pause

Mouse click - interact with cards

Authors:

Yulia Venglovska - developer, game designer

Yulia Menes - 2d artist, game designer

Oleksandr Ryabchuk - sound designer and animator, game designer, video designer
